meanings.definition: A person or thing that screeches loudly.
meanings.sent1: The screecher in the forest was a noisy owl.
meanings.sent2: The screecher startled me with its loud cry.
meanings.sent3: The screecher at the zoo made all the visitors cover their ears.
meanings.sent4: The screecher in the horror movie added to the eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The screecher's piercing sound echoed through the night.

meanings.definition: To make a loud, high-pitched noise.
meanings.sent1: I heard the cat screecher outside my window last night.
meanings.sent2: The brakes on the car screecher as it came to a sudden stop.
meanings.sent3: The teapot screecher when the water boiled.
meanings.sent4: The microphone screecher when feedback occurred during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The seagulls screecher as they circled above the beach.
